law.text: The Cabinet for Health and Family Services shall promulgate administrative regulations pursuant to KRS Chapter 13A for carrying out the provisions of this chapter. Administrative hearings on appeals filed pursuant to this chapter shall be conducted in accordance with KRS Chapter 13B.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 548, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 488, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 318, sec. 128, effective July 15, 1996. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(3). -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 226, sec. 27.
